org.treetank.access.conf
Class ResourceConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.access.conf.ResourceConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, IConfigureSerializable
public final class ResourceConfiguration
extends Object
implements IConfigureSerializable

ResourceConfiguration

Holds the settings for a resource which acts as a base for session that can not change. This includes all settings which are persistent. Each ResourceConfiguration is furthermore bound to one fixed database denoted by a related DatabaseConfiguration.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
See Also:
Serialized Form
